mutants.original_line: sum_value = sum(alphabet.get(char, 0) for char in string)
mutants.mutated_line: sum_value = sum((alphabet.get(char, 1) for char in string))

mutants.original_line: sum_value = sum(alphabet.get(char, 0) for char in string)
mutants.mutated_line: sum_value = sum((alphabet.get(char, -1) for char in string))

mutants.original_line: sum_value = sum(alphabet.get(char, 0) for char in string)
mutants.mutated_line: sum_value = sum((alphabet.get(char, 1) for char in string))
